message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a fair deal. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8,800. Can we meet in the middle again?
